name: Direct Mail Subscribe Form
author: e3 Software

sections.description:
If you use Direct Mail for Mac, this widget places a small subscribe form on your blog that lets visitors quickly and easily subscribe to your mailing list. Before using this plugin, be sure to set up your subscribe form in Direct Mail.

Email and live chat support is available at our support site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload DirectMailSubscribeForm.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Appearance > Widgets’ menu in WordPress to place the widget on your blog.
sections.faq:
How do I create a subscribe form in Direct Mail?

Please see this help article on how to create a subscribe form in Direct Mail: How do I add a subscribe form to my website?

How do I find out what my form ID is?

This help article explains how to find the proper form ID to enter into the WordPress widget editor.
